Action.Name: DlgScrollingText.AppendLine
Action.Description: Appends a new line to the current text in a scrolling text control.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the scrolling text control that you want to add a new line to.

Arg.Name: Line
Arg.Description: The line of text you want to add.

Arg.Name: AddNewLine
Arg.Description: Whether to add the text on a new line in the scrolling text window.

Arg.Name: ScrollToEnd
Arg.Description: Whether to scroll to the end of the text window after the text has been added.

Action.Name: DlgScrollingText.GetProperties
Action.Description: Gets the properties of a scrolling text control on the current screen.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the scrolling text control whose properties you want.

Action.Name: DlgScrollingText.SetProperties
Action.Description: Sets the properties of a scrolling text control on the current screen.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the scrolling text control whose properties you want to set.

Arg.Name: Properties
Arg.Description: A table containing the scrolling text control properties indexed by "Enabled", "Mode", "Text" and "Visible".
